## Slide with Plot

```{r plotly, echo = FALSE}
    suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(plotly))
    
    p <- plot_ly(iris, x = ~Sepal.Length, y = ~Petal.Length, 
                 color = ~Species, type = "scatter", mode = "markers")
    p
```
